blurb:
Full-stack product guy with 12+ years' experience getting startups started.
Business-minded designer, design-minded engineer, communication-minded PM.

experience.companyOneliner: Real estate developer building car-free neighborhoods
experience.title: Lead Product Designer
description: First full-time design hire; reported to and collaborated directly with both cofounders
Owned the digital resident experience for America's first car-free neighborhood, from business strategy to eng-ready design specs & occasional commits
Ran strategy, research, and design on marketing & ecommerce websites (e.g. browsing and leasing apartments online)
Expanded design beyond a screen-based practice into a strategic partner of product and leadership
Mentored younger colleagues who found the design education "inspiring"

experience.companyOneliner: Fortune 150 real estate company's software innovation lab
experience.title: Senior Product Designer
description: Co-led product, led design for Site IQ, a modern web application for broker teams; product's value & strategy were durable enough that it is still in active use & development
In a self-initiated project, I researched and designed CBRE Build, a new brand for tech teams within CBRE, and won approval directly from CEO Bob Sulentic
Implemented CBRE Build branding in digital and physical spaces across CBRE, including NYC, Seattle, Texas, and India
CBRE Build's brand was reviewed (positively!) in Brand New, proving the brand's purpose of stretching CBRE into new spaces
Only design/eng staffer to survive an 80% staff reduction

experience.companyOneliner: Eng-driven maker of online 3D tools for real estate teams
experience.title: Founding Designer
description: Collaborated directly with founders and founding engineers  to own ux and ui design for Floored's flagship software products
First design hire
Created and implemented design of Floored brand and marketing
Owned UI design for Floored's products, from sketch to delivery with engineers
CBRE Build's brand was reviewed (positively!) in Brand New, proving the brand's purpose of stretching CBRE into new spaces
Only design/eng staffer to survive an 80% staff reduction

experience.companyOneliner: Social recommendations app that counted Justin Bieber among its users
experience.title: Founding Designer
description: Acquired by Yahoo 2012
First design hire
Collaborated on product design with lead designer and founders
Contributed design mockups, UI code, and "Credit," a central product concept

education.description: Through RISD's cross-registration program with Brown, and summer courses at Carnegie Mellon University (Pittsburgh, PA), I earned credits worth a minor in Computer Science.

brags.title: 'Inventor' of Pivot Power
brags.description: I had the idea for Pivot Power, Quirky's iconic bestseller.
achievements: Created a unique design that, with the help of Quirky designers & engineers, became the company's breakout hit, winning premium placement in national retailers
Millions of units sold from Bed Bath & Beyond to the MOMA Store
First-listed Inventor on dozens of patents owned by Quirky
Press: The New York Times, The Wall Street Journal, Wired, Engadget, Gizmodo

awards.name: Included in the Cooper-Hewitt Smithsonian Design Museum's permanent collection, and the exhibition Beautiful Users

personal: "[Jake is] playful in [his] work and it's inspiring"
Will probably make you laugh, usually intentionally
tech: Swift: AppKit, UIKit & SwiftUI; Core Data
Lambda, Netlify, Firebase or your favorite db
Tailwind, styled-components, Stylus, sass, SCSS, and so on
Figma, Adobe, Framer, Affinity, you name it
